name: fighting game (andungha)
description:
this is just a prototype i made in 5 days for a fighting game im working on 

Controls:

P1: ASD to move, W to jump , Space to do normal attack , R to do special attack

P2: arrow keys to move, up key to jump , Slash to do normal attack , shift to do special attack

*note:player has 100 hp and can double jump  , normal attack has a 1 second delay and deals 5 damage , special attack has a 10 second delay and deals 30 damage
